message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be of significant value to you. I'm confident that this product could be a game-changer for your business.  While I can't disclose all the details just yet, I'm willing to offer it to you at a price of $1500000. This is a price point that reflects its potential value, but I'm open to negotiation.  Please let me know if you'd like to discuss this further.
